section.title: Extracting Running Processes from Virtual Machines and Templates
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine can collect processes running on Windows virtual machines. To do this, enter domain credentials for the zone where the virtual machine is located. For more information, see CloudForms Management Engine Settings and Operations Guide. The virtual machine must be running and must have an IP address in the VMDB, usually obtained from a SmartState Analysis.

step.para: Check the Virtual Machines to collect the processes.

Click
(Configuration), and then
(Extract Running Processes) on the Taskbar.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The server returns the running processes. View the summary of the virtual machine to see the details.
